summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Board of Public Works to grant a permit to the Lewis Construction Company, a corporation, to lay and maintain on Connecticut Street, from the Inner Harbor Line to Fourth Avenue South, and on Fourth Avenue South, from Connecticut Street to Jackson Street, all in the City of Seattle, a water main for the purpose of carrying salt water to be used in grading and regrading Jackson Street, and other streets, and property adjacent thereto, in the City of Seattle.
